title: Ep. 33 - The Cancer In The Bloodstream Of American Culture
description:
People think that our society is plagued by "hatred" and "division." They're wrong. Hatred isn't our problem. Our problem is indifference, which is worse than hatred and the true opposite of love.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
